projects.title: Deployable Bridges: Kinematics to Nonlinear Mechanics
projects.summary: End-to-end workflow for adaptive, quickly deployable bridge systems.
projects.abstract: We develop a computational pipeline coupling origami-based kinematics with nonlinear structural analysis to design reconfigurable bridges that can be rapidly deployed under load.

detail.body: More detailed description of objectives, methods, and findings. Include figures and links as needed.
